name: Aganorsa Leaf - Casa Fernandez Aganorsa Corojo - Torpedo
brand: Aganorsa Leaf, Casa Fernandez Aganorsa Corojo
additionalNotes: Flavorful and potent but not overwhelming, this full-bodied box-pressed Nicaraguan puro sports a Corojo 2006 wrapper draped over a carefully aged Nicaraguan binder and filler. It uses 100% Aganorsa Leaf tobacco, which is known for its remarkable flavor. The Casa Fernandez Aganorsa Corojo Toro is handmade in Nicaragua.
